analysis.Summary: JSON resource containing localization strings for the Sign Up view in English and Russian.
analysis.Purpose: Provides internationalized text for the user registration (Sign Up) interface, allowing the UI to display appropriate titles, descriptions, placeholders, notices, and button labels per locale.

Components.name: messages
Components.responsibility: Root container grouping all locale-specific dictionaries.

Components.name: en-default
Components.responsibility: Locale dictionary for English (default) with all required UI text keys.

Components.name: ru-default
Components.responsibility: Locale dictionary for Russian (default) with all required UI text keys translated.

Dependencies: SignUp view or component that imports this JSON for rendering text
analysis.Usage: Imported into the SignUp view or a localization service. The UI layer will request strings by key (e.g., messages['en-default'].title) based on the current user locale and render them accordingly.
analysis.Notes:
• Key naming follows a consistent pattern matching UI elements (title, description, placeholders, notices).  
• Easily extendable to additional locales by adding new top-level locale objects under 'messages'.  
• No dynamic logic; purely a static resource file.
